author: abdel.stark
content: Do we accept that the block coinbase  lose funds from a transaction if gas price < BASEFEE because of fee cap ?

author: timbeiko
content:
Would it make sense to organize a 1559 implementer call sometime in the next couple weeks? Our team will be more or less compatible with the Vulcanize implementation for Geth pretty soon (we've managed to send some 1559 txns from geth to besu already but are still working on some edge cases). 

Getting this EIP deployed will require a lot of community coordination and IMO it would be good for whoever wants to be involved to align on next steps. Thoughts?

author: sambacha
content: sounds good, there a reference implementation I can roll out or test net to coordinate with ?

author: sambacha
content: Any idea on a rollout schedule ?

author: timbeiko
content: The two only I'm aware of are the Besu and Geth ones. Not sure about Open Ethereum or Nethermind

author: timbeiko
content: Would 14:00 UTC (AllCoreDevs time) next Thursday work for everyone? Happy to set up a proper agenda if that time works.
